Package uicc.access

This package provides the means to the applets for accessing the UICC file system defined in the TS 102 221 specification.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileView The FileView interface defines the methods to access a UICC file system.
UICCConstants The UICCConstants interface hold all the constants defined in TS 102.221
 

Class Summary
UICCSystem The UICCSystem class provides a way to get a view of a UICC File system.
 

Exception Summary
UICCException The UICCViewException class encapsulates specific exceptions which can be thrown by the methods of an object that implements a UICCView interface, in case of error.
 

Package uicc.access Description

This package provides the means to the applets for accessing the UICC file system defined in the TS 102 221 specification.

The Package Application Identifier (AID) format is defined in TS 101 220
